comments.body: Can you [move this to an old version](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped#if-a-library-is-updated-to-a-new-major-version-with-breaking-changes-how-should-i-update-its-type-declaration-package) instead?
Ah. Well if the types for 4.0 are complete and won't need to be updated and there are not breaking changes it should be fine.
ok, please approve if there are no other problems üëç
